ModMetaData.name: High Tech Laboratory Facilities (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
New and redesigned laboratory facilities for a more high tech look. Also an upgraded power armor with helmet to construct and a lab coat to research faster.
This is a reupload since the original mod has not been updated from B18. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=841760538
